author: maxb
msg: Follow up to r20700 - it turns out that *one* of those seemingly-bogus mentions
of 'neon' was actually a workaround for a libtool bug. Reintroduce it, *also*
adding it to the two other cases which were similar, and this time add a large
comment explaining the issue so that in future people are not left wondering
as to its presence, and aren't tempted to clean it up.
* build.conf: Add neon dependency to svn, svnsync, and ra-local-test.
Add comment explaining why.

author: maxb
msg: * build.conf: As an exercise in curiosity, audit all our "libs" lines, setting
them to the real direct dependencies of the libraries and programs. In most
cases, this consisted of removing unnecessary mentions of 'aprutil', and a
few bizarre extra mentions of 'neon'.
Things not audited: libsvn_ra_serf, java, and external targets.

author: maxb
msg: * build.conf: Remove obsolete, commented-out, svn-config and svn-design targets.

author: lgo
msg: Added new XFail test for issue 1869.
* subversion/tests/cmdline/basic_tests.py
(move_relative_paths): New test, check that we can use relative
paths when moving files in the working copy.
(is_this_windows): New function.
(test_list): added move_relative_paths test, XFails when tests are
run on Windows, the test should pass on other platforms.

author: maxb
msg: Revert r20677, potentially temporarily, list discussion to follow.
* subversion/bindings/swig/svn_repos.i
